name: Digger Gam
description:
Inspired by:

Instructions

If the yellow part of the digger (excluding the arm) touches the ground the level restarts.

Fullscreen recommended to avoid scrolling when adjusting bucket.

Click inside the game to hide and lock the mouse cursor.

Controls

Q/A

Left Wheels Forward/Backward

E/D

Right Wheels Forward/Backward

Mouse Left/Right

Spin

W/S

Big Arm Section Extend/Retract

Mouse up/down

Little Arm Section Extend/Retract

Scroll Wheel Up/Down

Bucket Extend/Retract

Right Click + Mouse/Scroll

Move/Zoom Camera

1-9

Stored Camera Views

Left Ctrl + 1-9

Store Current View

Esc

Unlock Mouse Cursor

Space

Place Checkpoint
